text: Catherine Small Long (February 7, 1924 - November 23, 2019) was a Democratic former U.S. representative for Louisiana's 8th congressional district, serving from 1985 to 1987. She was the first female military veteran elected to Congress,Doris Weatherford, Women in American Politics: History and Milestones, Vo. 1, p.165. having served as a WAVE in the United States Navy. Long died of dementia-related problems on November 23, 2019 in Chevy Chase, Maryland.Cathy Long, won husbandâ€™s US House seat after his death, dies She was 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:United States representatives from Louisiana Category:Military people from Ohio Category:Politicians from Dayton, Ohio Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Catherine Small Long
